text: Moreschi is an Italian surname that may refer to the following: *Alessandro Moreschi, the last of the castrati *Gabriela Gonçalves Dias Moreschi (born 1994), Brazilian handballer *Luigia Polzelli, born Luigia Moreschi (1760-1830), Joseph Haydn's mistress *Sandra Moreschi (born 1946), Italian designer of Jewish ceremonial art
title: Moreschi
